code: import{combineReducers}from'redux';import auth,*as authSelectors from"./auth";import maps,*as mapSelectors from"./map";var reducer=combineReducers({auth:auth,maps:maps});export default reducer;export var getAuthToken=function getAuthToken(state){return authSelectors.getAuthToken(state.auth);};export var getIsAuthenticating=function getIsAuthenticating(state){return authSelectors.getIsAuthenticating(state.auth);};export var getIsAuthenticatingError=function getIsAuthenticatingError(state){return authSelectors.getIsAuthenticatingError(state.auth);};export var isAuthenticated=function isAuthenticated(state){getAuthToken(state.auth)!=null;};export var getError=function getError(state){return authSelectors.getError(state.auth);};export var getIsLogging=function getIsLogging(state){return authSelectors.getIsLogging(state.auth);};export var getIsSigning=function getIsSigning(state){return authSelectors.getIsSigning(state.auth);};export var getMap=function getMap(state,id){return mapSelectors.getMap(state.maps,id);};export var getMaps=function getMaps(state){return mapSelectors.getMaps(state.maps);};export var getCreateError=function getCreateError(state){return mapSelectors.getCreateError(state.maps);};
